nodes.text: Rhodochrosite was a type of red crystal that made up most of the planet Crait. It was considered moderately valuable.

Star Wars: The Last Jedi: Incredible Cross-Sections incorrectly spells the mineral's name as "rhodocrosite." A rhodochrosite crystal is able to be hung in the cockpit of a New Republic starfighter in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons for 800 of the game's in-game currency, glory.
